div.bibl: THE PHILIPPINE MESSENGER, Vol. III, No. 7, March 22, 1936Center's Debating Society met at the Community Center on March 19th.

body.p: The subject: "Resolved, That the Conscription Law of the Philippines Should Be Repealed." The negative side was upheld by Mr. J. Calapini and Mr. M. Magbanua, and the affirmative by Mr. Grande and Mr. Pizrro. The negative side won. It was a very interesting debate.
The Society meets every Thursday evening.
